beats.name: Opening Image
beats.description: A snapshot of the hero's world before the journey begins. This should visually represent the theme and tone of the story.

beats.name: Setup
beats.description: Introduces the hero's world, their normal life, and hints at their internal problem. Shows what needs to change.

beats.name: Theme Stated
beats.description: Someone (usually not the hero) states the theme of the movie, often in dialogue. This is what the hero needs to learn.

beats.name: Catalyst
beats.description: An event that breaks the hero's normal world and sets the story in motion. The hero can't return to their old life.

beats.name: Debate
beats.description: The hero hesitates to take action, weighing the risks and rewards of the journey ahead.

beats.name: Break into Two
beats.description: The hero makes a decision and commits to the journey, leaving their old world behind.

beats.name: B Story
beats.description: A subplot that often involves the hero's emotional journey or a love interest. Provides a break from the main plot.

beats.name: Fun and Games
beats.description: The main section of Act Two where the hero faces challenges and experiences the new world. Often contains the movie's most entertaining scenes.

beats.name: Midpoint
beats.description: A major event that raises the stakes and often involves a false victory or false defeat. The hero's goal becomes clearer.

beats.name: Bad Guys Close In
beats.description: The hero faces increasing pressure from both external and internal conflicts. Things get worse.

beats.name: All Is Lost
beats.description: The hero hits rock bottom, experiencing a major defeat or loss. Often involves a 'whiff of death'.

beats.name: Dark Night of the Soul
beats.description: The hero reflects on their journey and must find the strength to continue. Often involves a moment of clarity.

beats.name: Break into Three
beats.description: The hero finds a solution and makes a final push toward their goal, armed with what they've learned.

beats.name: Finale
beats.description: The hero faces their final challenge and proves they've learned the theme. The story's main conflict is resolved.

beats.name: Final Image
beats.description: A visual bookend to the Opening Image, showing how the hero and their world have changed.
